resources.name: Tae Kim's Grammar Guide
resources.description: Comprehensive free grammar guide for all levels.
resources.descriptionLong: Tae Kim's Guide to Learning Japanese is one of the most popular free resources for Japanese grammar. It covers everything from basic sentence structure to advanced patterns with clear explanations and examples. A must-read for all Japanese learners.
resources.notes: Essential free grammar resource. Also available as an app.

resources.name: Imabi
resources.descriptionLong: Imabi provides incredibly detailed Japanese grammar explanations that go beyond typical textbooks. It covers classical Japanese, dialects, and nuanced grammar points. Excellent for intermediate to advanced learners seeking deep understanding.
resources.notes: Very detailed. Great for advanced grammar study.

resources.name: Bunpro
resources.descriptionLong: Bunpro uses spaced repetition to help you master Japanese grammar points. It covers all JLPT levels with detailed explanations, example sentences, and links to external resources. The platform tracks your progress and adapts reviews.
resources.notes: Best platform for systematic grammar study.

resources.name: Dictionary of Japanese Grammar Series
resources.nameJa: 日本語文法辞典シリーズ
resources.descriptionLong: The Dictionary of Japanese Grammar series (Basic, Intermediate, Advanced) is the definitive reference for Japanese grammar. Each entry includes detailed explanations, numerous examples, and comparisons with similar patterns. A must-have for serious learners.
resources.notes: The gold standard grammar reference. Three volumes available.

resources.name: Maggie Sensei
resources.description: Natural grammar explanations with real examples.
resources.descriptionLong: Maggie Sensei provides grammar explanations focusing on natural, conversational Japanese. Each lesson includes plenty of example sentences showing real-world usage. Great for understanding how grammar is actually used.

resources.name: Wasabi Japanese Grammar
resources.descriptionLong: Wasabi Japanese offers structured grammar lessons with clear explanations and practice exercises. The site organizes grammar by level and topic, making it easy to find what you need.

resources.name: JLPT Sensei Grammar
resources.descriptionLong: JLPT Sensei provides grammar explanations organized by JLPT level. Each grammar point includes explanations, example sentences, and practice questions. Great for JLPT preparation.

resources.name: Bunpo.jp
resources.description: Clean grammar dictionary with quick lookups.
resources.descriptionLong: Bunpo.jp is a grammar dictionary with a clean interface for quick lookups. Each entry includes explanations, examples, and JLPT level information. Great for checking specific grammar points.

resources.name: Japanese Sentence Patterns
resources.descriptionLong: Resources focusing on Japanese sentence patterns help learners understand how to construct various types of sentences. Learning patterns provides templates for expressing different ideas.

resources.name: Cure Dolly's Organic Japanese
resources.description: Unique approach to understanding Japanese structure.
resources.descriptionLong: Cure Dolly presents Japanese grammar from a unique perspective, focusing on the organic structure of the language. The approach helps learners understand how Japanese actually works rather than memorizing rules.
